DOC.brief_summary: A phase 1 , open-label study subject normal renal function subject various degree renal insufficiency , include patient end-stage renal disease ( ESRD ) require hemodialysis . The primary objective evaluate single-dose PK AMG 423 subject various degree renal insufficiency , include patient end-stage renal disease require hemodialysis .
